query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS wateringLogs (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT,
  tentId INT NOT NULL,
  wateringDate DATE NOT NULL,
  wateringTime TIME NOT NULL,
  volumeIn DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL COMMENT 'Volume de água aplicado (L)',
  volumeOut DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL COMMENT 'Volume de runoff coletado (L)',
  runoffPercent DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL COMMENT 'Percentual de runoff calculado',
  notes TEXT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX idx_tent_date (tentId, wateringDate),
  FOREIGN KEY (tentId) REFERENCES tents(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 28MX9rHeRYrkZKS.5ffbe178d99f --database AhyBXV9CDav4cSFRqphBxc --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS wateringLogs (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT,
  tentId INT NOT NULL,
  wateringDate DATE NOT NULL,
  wateringTime TIME NOT NULL,
  volumeIn DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL COMMENT 'Volume de água aplicado (L)',
  volumeOut DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL COMMENT 'Volume de runoff coletado (L)',
  runoffPercent DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL COMMENT 'Percentual de runoff calculado',
  notes TEXT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX idx_tent_date (tentId, wateringDate),
  FOREIGN KEY (tentId) REFERENCES tents(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;
